name: AbuseIPDB
description: IP address reputation database that helps identify malicious IP addresses

options.name: api_key
options.label: API Key
options.description: Your AbuseIPDB API key (get it from https://www.abuseipdb.com/account/api)

options.name: max_age_days
options.label: Max Age in Days
options.description: Maximum age of reports to include (1-365 days)

options.name: rate_limit
options.label: Rate Limit (requests per day)
options.description: API rate limit for free accounts (1000 requests/day)
